question: Assuming today is May 01, 2022, which of the following statements is true?

options.A: Company Z had more new employees in 2018 than in 2020.
options.B: The number of new employees per year fell sharply in 2022.
options.C: The total number of employees in company Z keep the same with previous in 2022.

explanation: This area chart shows annual employee recruitment data with 2022 displaying only partial-year results (as of May 01, 2022, representing approximately 4 months or 33% of the year). The inappropriate aggregation misleadingly compares incomplete 2022 data (420 new employees in 4 months) with complete annual data from previous years. While 2022 appears to show a sharp decline in recruitment, this is simply because only the first four months are included. We cannot determine if there was actually a decline without the complete year's data.
